comment.author: 38013396@N03
comment._content: It is so beautiful!  I love this tranquil and peaceful view of Scotland.  Hope one day I will travel there and have fun.

comment.author: 38488942@N06
comment._content: Inveraray is a great place to visit. The jail is in this picture - on the right sticking into the loch. The hill behind is a good climb from which the village and loch look great .... it's very muddy up there though.
